tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_instruments (
    instrument_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    instrument_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    issuer_company VARCHAR(100),
    issue_date DATE,
    maturity_date DATE,
    face_value DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
    market_value DECIMAL(18, 2),
    currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE bonds (
  bond_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bond_name VARCHAR(255),
  issuer VARCHAR(255),
  issue_date DATE,
  maturity_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE bonds (
    bond_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    issuer VARCHAR(255),
    issue_date DATE,
    maturity_date DATE,
    nominal_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    coupon_rate DECIMAL(4, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE derivatives (
    derivative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    underlying_asset VARCHAR(255),
    expiration_date DATE,
    contract_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE structured_products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    issuance_date DATE,
    principal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    asset_allocation JSON
)

CREATE TABLE bond (
    bond_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bond_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    issuer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    maturity_date DATE,
    coupon_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    face_value DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE derivatives (
    derivative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    underlying_asset VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    valuation DECIMAL(10,2),
    expiration_date DATE,
    positions INT
);

CREATE TABLE structured_products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    issuing_bank VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    underlying_assets VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    maturity_term INT,
    principal_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_id INT NOT NULL,
    assessment_date DATE,
    risk_score DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    volatility DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE bonds (
    bond_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bond_name VARCHAR(255),
    issuer_name VARCHAR(255),
    issue_date DATE,
    maturity_date DATE,
    coupon_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE derivatives (
    derivative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    derivative_type VARCHAR(255),
    underlying_asset VARCHAR(255),
    expiration_date DATE,
    strike_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    contract_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE structured_products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    issuer_name VARCHAR(255),
    issue_date DATE,
    maturity_date DATE,
    underlying_assets TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_type VARCHAR(255),
    risk_score DECIMAL(7,4),
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE valuations (
    valuation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_type VARCHAR(255),
    valuation_amount DECIMAL(12,2),
    valuation_date DATE,
    valuation_notes TEXT
)
